code: var getTimeMessage=function getTimeMessage(){var today=new Date();var currentMonth=today.getMonth();var daysLeft=31-today.getDate();if(currentMonth!==9){return"It isn't even October yet!";}if(daysLeft===0){return"It's the very last day! Get your last PRs in!";}if(daysLeft===1){return'One more day, keep it going!';}if(daysLeft<10){return"There's only ".concat(daysLeft," days left! You can do it!");}return"There's ".concat(daysLeft," days remaining!");};export default getTimeMessage;
